channel.title: CVE Feed for async-graphql -- async-graphql
channel.description: The latest CVEs for async-graphql -- async-graphql

item.title: CVE-2024-47614|2024-10-03T14:29:59.124Z -- async-graphql -- async-graphql
item.description: async-graphql is a GraphQL server library implemented in Rust. async-graphql before 7.0.10 does not limit the number of directives for a field. This can lead to Service Disruption, Resource Exhaustion, and User Experience Degradation. This vulnerability is fixed in 7.0.10.
